fr_FR.description: Ce mod est une compilation de tweaks qui, selon l'auteur, améliorent les choses telles qu'elles sont dans le jeu vanilla. La grande majorité des tweaks sont conçus pour être de simples améliorations d'objets ou de capacités sous-puissants. Certains d'entre eux modifient le jeu un peu plus en profondeur, mais pas de façon radicale.

en_US.description: This mod is a compilation of tweaks which, according to the author, improve things as they are in the vanilla game. The vast majority of tweaks are designed to be simple improvements to underpowered items or abilities. Some of them modify the game a little more deeply, but not radically.

components.103: Install user-selected components in the General group
components.120: Make conjured magical weapons grant 2 APR by default
components.443: Make "Symbol, X" spells slightly more powerful and rebalance the enemy versions
components.1120: Make some weapon categories suffer penalties to backstabbing for balance
components.1121: Make flails and morning stars always inflict some piercing damage
components.1150: Make some weapon categories adjust their damage configuration
components.1361: Make axes or halberds deal extra damage on critical hits
components.1362: Make maces, clubs, and hammers damage the target's AC temporarily
components.1435: Make darts faster and with longer range
components.1440: Make daggers get extra features to compensate for low damage
components.1450: Make thief weapons able to do 'Finesse' damage when used by pure rogues
components.1534: Make some potions more balanced or useful
components.1537: Make poison-curing spells cast instantly & protect vs. poison briefly
components.1650: Make mage robes without cloaks cloaked
components.1541: Make vorpal hits fail if target has stoneskins
components.1539: Make every class or just rogues able to use scrolls
components.1544: Make scrolls always cast at the character level regardless of class
components.1545: Make character stats more streamlined or interesting
components.1546: Make shield types more distinct and change shield usability
components.1547: Make Protection from Undead more balanced
components.1600: Make everyone able to perform omnidirectional backstabs
components.1360: Make Light Crossbows get +1/2 more APR
components.1329: Make disrupt undead weapons more balanced and closer to PnP rules
components.1397: Make rangers, thieves, and monks hit harder with ranged weapons if invisible
components.1548: Make Void-weapons slightly more effective and logical
components.1532: Make all bracers, belts and boots grant +1 HP, so unenchanted variants aren't just garbage
components.1001: Install user-selected components in the Gear group
components.1170: Make Shadow Dragon Scale behave less like a Black Dragon Scale
components.1171: Make Silver Dragon Scale also grant 40% cold resistance
components.1172: Make Rings of Elemental Control more powerful
components.1173: Make Ring of Gaxx's improved haste last 2 rounds
components.1174: Make Heartwood Ring grant spell slots and regeneration
components.1180: Make Ring of Danger Sense grant defensive traits
components.1316: Make Mercykiller Ring more useful for pure thieves and rangers
components.1317: Make the basic arcane robes more remarkable

components.1561: Make Cloak of the Stars more useful
components.1570: Make Eyes of the Beholder better and grant immunity to matching rays

components.1664: Make ioun stones and/or circlets protect vs. critical hits

components.1671: Make The Eyes of Truth add a bonus to Detect Illusions and Find Traps
components.1672: Make Stalker Gauntlets also benefit Bounty Hunters and Shadowdancers

components.1124: Install user-selected components in the One-handed Swords group

components.555: Make Chromatic Orb more interesting by providing party-only chromatic varieties

components.561: Make Web force saves vs. Breath at +0 instead of saves vs. Spell at -2 for balance
components.562: Make Imprisonment prevent movement while the animation plays out
components.99: Install user-selected components in the Divine Magic group
components.100: Make Glyph of Warding do damage on a failed save and extend damage up to level 20
components.101: Make Flame Blade be more effective vs. undead, and last for as long as it does in IWDEE
components.110: Make Bless and Curse last longer and increase the casting speed from 6 to 3
components.130: Make Hold Person saving throw penalties standardized at -1

components.270: Make Entangle more powerful and relevant for druids and shamans

components.2232: Make Called Shot directly increase ranged weapon damage

components.3020: Make summoned demons grant XP to the party when they kill something

zh_CN.description: 此模组是一个调整项的汇编，据作者称，这些调整项改进了原版游戏中的事物。绝大多数调整项旨在作为物品或能力较弱项的简单改进。其中一些对游戏进行了更深入的修改，但并非根本性的改变。
